settings.heading: RAM® Tough-Claw™
settings.copy: The RAM® Tough-Claw™ is the perfect mounting base for quick installation and removal on round, square, and odd-shaped rails and bars – such as handlebars or roll cages. This ideal mounting solution for tablets, action cameras, phones, and much more can be clamped on rails from .625” to 2.25” in diameter.

settings.heading: Features
settings.copy: Available with either a B size 1” or C size 1.5” rubber ball, the RAM® Tough-Claw™ is constructed with high-strength, glass-filled nylon and corrosion-resistant stainless steel hardware. Rubber pads provide a stable, protective, and even grip to the mounting surface, and the unique clamp jaw is configured to attach to round, flat, and odd-shaped rails and bars.

settings.heading: Bases
settings.copy: The RAM® Tough-Claw™ is available in three sizes – all of which feature your choice of a B Size and C Size rubber ball. The smallest size supports a clamping range of .625” to 1.5” on rail and tube surfaces, and a clamping range up to 1.14” on flat surfaces. The medium-sized version supports a clamping range of 1” to 1.875” on rail and tube surfaces, and a clamping range up to 1.6” on flat surfaces. Lastly, the large RAM® Tough-Claw™ supports a clamping range of 1” to 2.25” on rail and tube surfaces, and a clamping range up to 2.2” on flat surfaces.

settings.heading: Low-Profile Mounts
settings.copy: For a clean look, the RAM® Tough-Claw™ is available as a low-profile mounting solution supporting cup holders and phones. This design is perfect for bikes and motorcycles when you want to keep your drink or device close to the handlebar.

settings.heading: Double Ball Mounts
settings.copy: The interchangeable RAM® ball and socket design offers the ability to swap components, as well as the ability to easily adjust the position of your mount for ideal viewing. Combined with the RAM® Tough-Claw™, this mounting system is suited for any rugged environment.
